description: Sage 300, formerly known as Accpac, is the comprehensive ERP solution for growing businesses. It unifies accounting, purchasing, inventory, sales, and more into a centralized system, automating processes and maximizing efficiency. At Tersoft, we not only implement Sage 300 but also adapt and optimize the tool to your needs, facing challenges and ensuring the success of your business.
